ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Sebilis Keys
ygData.msgSnippet: Although you have to go a little bit farther to zone in case things go bad - camping by the tunnel to Swamp zone is closer to the spawn point than camping the
ygData.messageBody:
Although you have to go a little bit farther to zone in case things go bad -
camping by the tunnel to Swamp zone is closer to the spawn point than
camping the EJ zone.

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 6:28 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sebilis Keys

A 53 SK and 52 Shaman MIGHT be able to kill the hunter/forager, but it will
be very tough. You as a 35 bard will not be contributing very much to the
fight so it will be up to the two of them. My regular group when I did the
hunter/forager cycle consisted of me at 47, another bard 50th level, 49
cleric, 55 warrior and a 50 enchanter. One of the bards would track and
